issue.title: [Plasma] Fix off-by-one error in retry processing
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1853](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1853). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When a user construct a plasma client that should not perform a single retry, by passing num_retries = 0, nothing happens due to an off-by-one error in the retry processing.
